es.csic.iiia.bms.factors
Interface CardinalityFactor.CardinalityFunction

Enclosing class:
CardinalityFactor<T>
public static interface CardinalityFactor.CardinalityFunction

Interface of a cardinality function.

A workload function is a function that returns a cost depending on the number of variables to be active.

Author:
Marc Pujol

Method Summary

          Get the cost of activating the given number variables.
